title: Bard video....
body:
After watching the recent Bard video that was release i have realized that if Riot was to make a league of legends anime, i would definitely watch it!

Im just saying.... Do it now!

replies.body: It made me really want to watch 'Avatar'
the animators for the video were the animators that animated avatar/korra

OMG! Like i dont thik they could purely base it on a champions, i think if they did they would have to make brand new character as the main and that actual champions as background and features of episodes or they might not even be in certain episodes i dunno :P
Wtf noway... Send me your resources??

give this man a cookie riot do this pls

As a note i think this would be awesome, but it would be even more awesome if it was based off the old lore (the actual league existing and whatnot)

The current lore is good for a few fancy videos, but past that it doesn't have a real attractive TV series sort of anime vibe to it.

if they did release a LoL anime I would like it to be based around Hecarim, Thresh, Elise, etc and how they plot to eradicate Noxus, some champions would need to be left out, but there should be room for 35-50% of champions imo....

they arnt just going for noxus, i think it would be better if champions made side appearances and werent Main Characters of you know what i mean, still important but not main protagonists, but yes a story line revolving around the shadow isles trying to engulf the rest of the world would be good.
